inclusion.criterion: diagnosis of SCI, MS, AMP, MD or LBP
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: moderate to severe chronic pain possibly related to MS, SCI, AMP, MD, or LBP that is persistent in nature
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: able to read, speak, and understand English
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: severe cognitive impairment defined as two or more errors on the Six-Item Screen

exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Pre-existing medical conditions that might interfere with EEG assessments
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has CLL and large cell transformation, but meets some inclusion criteria. Exclusion criterion 'Pre-existing medical conditions that might interfere with EEG assessments' is likely to be triggered.
